headline: A Return to the Philharmonic,  This Time According to Plan
abstract: The conductor Simone Young, a last-minute replacement in April, is back this week, on her own terms.
lead_paragraph: Last April, the conductor Simone Young, who had not returned to the New York Philharmonic since her debut in 1998, saved the day by jumping in on short notice to conduct the orchestra in Mahlerâ€™s Sixth Symphony.
